Description: Body sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; part of lotus flower in added white outline and added red centre above red and white bands; exterior: part of sphinx’s face, to left.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 288, no. 850, pl. 118)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1041) (phase 2)
